document_data.name: Nauseef Flow
document_data.mainbody: The '''Nauseef Flow''' was a short river in [[Netheril]].
document_data.Description: The Nauseef Flow was described to be quiet. Though its source, the [[Firehorn Peaks]], was known to emit a red glow during [[Midsummer]], the Nauseef Flow did not.
document_data.Georgraphy: The river started in the Firehorn Peaks. From there it flowed east into the [[Netheril River]], which itself flowed close to the [[Eastern Forest]].
